Course.title: Dynamic Programming
Course.Description: Familiarizes students with the operation of the Dynamic Programming algorithm.

Unit.title: Dynamic Programming: See One
Unit.Description: In this unit, the student will see an example of how each primary step of the Dynamic Programming algorithm is performed. It also exposes the student to the general operation of the DpTu application.

Step.title: Acknowledge Welcome
Step.Msg: Welcome, I'm DpTu. I'll begin by showing you how this application works by demonstrating how Dynamic Programming works.\n\n When I send you an information message, like this one, all you have to do is acknowledge it by pressing the 'Acknowledged' button.
Step.Hint: Acknowledge this message by pressing the 'Acknowledged' button.

Step.title: See One Overview
Step.Msg: Before I have you practice the operations associated with a Dynamic Programming algorithm, I'm going to show you how these operations work. Along the way, we'll demonstrate some of the actions you can perform in this application including how you can interact with me. BTW, I'm a dumb AI, so don't expect too much. Once again, this is an information message, so please move on by pressing the 'Acknowledged' button.
Step.Hint: Acknowledge this message by pressing the 'Acknowledged' button.

Unit.title: Dynamic Programming: Do One
Unit.Description: In this unit, the student must perform each primary step of the a Dynamic Programming algorithm execution.

Unit.title: Dynamic Programming: Teach One
Unit.Description: In this unit, the student must teach an AI-agent to perform each primary step in the Dynamic Programming algorithm.

KnowledgeComponent.title: Information Message Acknowledgement
KnowledgeComponent.Description: Student has appropriately demonstrated acknowleding information messages presented by the tutor.
